item.title: 文件显示，BBVA 可能降低萨瓦德尔银行的最低承兑水平
item.description: BBVA SA 表示已获得美国证券监管机构的许可，有可能降低其收购 Banco Sabadell SA 的最低收购门槛，这是该公司首次披露可能考虑采取这一举措。【原文：BBVA SA said it received permission from the US securities regulator to potentially lower the minimum acceptance threshold for its bid to acquire Banco Sabadell SA, disclosing for the first time that it may consider such a move.】

item.title: 日本将创纪录提高最低工资，支持日本央行加息
item.description: 日本将把最低时薪上调 6.3%，达到创纪录的 1121 日元（7.56 美元），这将强化该国的工资-物价周期，并支持日本央行继续加息。【原文：Japan will raise its minimum hourly wage by a record 6.3% to ¥1,121 ($7.56), reinforcing the nation’s wage-price cycle and supporting the case for the Bank of Japan to keep hiking rates.】

item.title: 财政担忧缓解，印度长期限债券吸引买家
item.description: 在印度政府表示最近的消费税削减对财政收入的影响有限之后，印度遭受重创的长期债券重新引起了银行和基金经理的兴趣。【原文：India’s battered long-term bonds are drawing renewed interest from banks and fund managers, after the government signaled that recent consumption tax cuts will have a limited impact on revenue.】

item.title: 法国 "岌岌可危 "的债务之路让巴伊鲁的继任者头疼不已
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）下周很可能被赶下法国总理的宝座，这将使他的继任者对法国债务的可持续性感到头疼。【原文：Francois Bayrou’s likely ouster as French premier next week will leave his successor with a persisting headache over the sustainability of the country’s debt, Bloomberg Economics says.】

item.title: 英国零售销售数据修正版显示增长逊于预期
item.description: 周五公布的数据显示，截至 7 月份的三个月中，英国零售销售额有所下降，这表明消费者的谨慎态度继续阻碍着工党的增长计划。【原文：UK retail sales declined in the three months to July, according to figures released on Friday, in signs that consumer caution continues to hold back Labour’s plans for growth.】

item.title: 空洞骑士：丝歌等待七年后，《虚空骑士：丝歌》荣登游戏排行榜榜首
item.description: 澳大利亚制作的视频游戏《空洞骑士》（Hollow Knight：Silksong》吸引了等待了七年之久的用户，一举登上排行榜榜首。【原文：Australian-made video game Hollow Knight: Silksong is captivating users who’ve waited seven years for a glimpse, shooting to the top of the charts.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单意外下降阻碍反弹希望
item.description: 德国工厂订单出乎意料地出现了自 1 月份以来的最大降幅，削弱了人们对该行业能很快摆脱三年衰退的乐观预期。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly slumped the most since January, undermining optimism that the sector can soon emerge from three years of recession.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国 8 月房价再创新高
item.description: 据英国最大的贷款机构之一称，由于借贷成本降低和工资快速增长提高了购房者的负担能力，英国房价连续第三个月上涨，创下历史新高。【原文：UK house prices rose for a third straight month to a record high as cheaper borrowing costs and rapid wage gains improve affordability for buyers, according to one of the country’s biggest lenders.】

item.title: 南非经济停滞不前，福特、嘉能可裁员
item.description: 福特汽车公司、Glencore Plc 和 ArcelorMittal SA 本周宣布计划在南非裁员数千人，进一步打击了面临大规模失业和增长乏力的南非经济。【原文：Ford Motor Co., Glencore Plc and ArcelorMittal SA this week announced plans to cut thousands of jobs in South Africa, dealing a further blow to an economy contending with mass unemployment and lackluster growth.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市延续涨势，英镑收复失地
中国巨型铁矿石贸易商扩大销售淡水河谷货物的影响力
item.description: 中国的国营铁矿石贸易商目前正在为巴西矿商淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）销售货物，这表明随着该集团在亚洲国家价值 1,300 亿美元的进口市场中的地位日益稳固，中国对该集团的态度有所缓和。【原文：China’s state-run iron ore trader is now selling cargoes for Brazilian miner Vale SA, in a sign of some softening toward the group as it becomes embedded in the Asian country’s $130 billion import market.】

item.title: 大力发展零售业后，苹果在印度的销售额达到创纪录的 90 亿美元
item.description: 上一财年，苹果公司在印度的年销售额达到创纪录的近 90 亿美元，这表明随着该公司在世界人口最多的国家扩大零售业务，消费者对其旗舰设备的需求不断增长。【原文：Apple Inc.’s annual sales in India hit a record of nearly $9 billion in the last fiscal year, signaling growing consumer demand for its flagship devices as the company ramps up its retail footprint in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 花旗银行关闭零售银行后退出中国银联网络
item.description: 花旗集团关闭在中国的零售银行业务后，退出了中国一个重要的支付网络。【原文：Citigroup Inc. has exited from a key payment network in China after it closed its retail banking business in the nation.】

item.title: Anthropic 禁止为中资企业提供人工智能服务
item.description: Anthropic 正在阻止中国控制的公司使用其服务，称其正在采取措施防止美国对手在人工智能领域取得进展，威胁美国的国家安全。【原文：Anthropic is blocking its services from Chinese-controlled companies, saying it’s taking steps to prevent a US adversary from advancing in AI and threatening American national security.】

item.title: 土耳其央行行长对通胀持乐观态度，银行重新规划利率路径
item.description: 土耳其央行行长法提赫-卡拉汉（Fatih Karahan）在数据不及预期和市场动荡之后，对通胀前景持乐观态度，认为投资者可能过于草率地降低了对降息的预期。【原文：Turkey’s central bank Governor Fatih Karahan struck an optimistic note on the inflation outlook following worse-than-expected data and market turmoil, suggesting investors may have been too hasty in reducing their forecasts for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 台湾保险公司将投入多年来最大的现金储备
item.description: 台湾最大的保险公司正在抢购海外债券，准备将多年来最大一笔现金投入海外，以寻求更高的收益率。【原文：Taiwan’s largest insurers are looking to snap up overseas bonds as they prepare to invest their biggest cash piles in years in search of higher yields.】

item.title: 印度部长称不要因美国贸易协议延迟而 "恐慌
item.description: 印度商业和工业部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）表示，应允许与美国继续就贸易协议进行谈判，没有必要对延迟感到 "恐慌"。【原文：India’s Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal said negotiations with the US on the trade deal should be allowed to continue and that there was no need to “panic” over the delay.】

item.title: 如果回避特朗普的投资选择，日本将面临更高的关税风险
item.description: 根据一份文件充实了两国在 7 月份达成的 5,500 亿美元融资倡议，如果日本不为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的投资建议提供资金，就有可能要支付更高的关税。【原文：Japan risks having to pay higher tariffs if it doesn’t fund US President Donald Trump’s investment recommendations, according to a document fleshing out a $550 billion funding initiative agreed by the two nations in July.】

item.title: 行业出现复苏迹象，中国太阳能股延续涨势
item.description: 中国太阳能股延续了牛市走势，由于政府推动减少产能过剩并结束残酷的价格战，市场乐观地认为行业转折点即将到来。【原文：Chinese solar shares extended a bull run, as optimism builds that a sector turning point is in sight given authorities’ push to reduce overcapacity and end a cutthroat price war.】

item.title: 股市热情降温，中国债券拍卖需求增加
item.description: 在周五的拍卖会上，中国的较长期限债券显示出需求改善的迹象，因为股市反弹能否持续的不确定性改善了债市情绪。【原文：China’s longer-tenor bonds showed signs of improved demand at an auction Friday, as uncertainty about the sustainability of an equity rally improved sentiment toward the debt market.】

item.title: 民调显示欧洲央行降息结束，通胀率将保持在 2% 左右
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧洲中央银行已经完成了降息，新的预测将确认通胀率在中期内将保持在目标水平。【原文：The European Central Bank is done lowering interest rates, with fresh projections set to confirm inflation will hold at target over the medium term, a Bloomberg survey showed.】

item.title: 诺和诺德的困境和特朗普的关税削弱了丹麦的增长前景
item.description: 丹麦央行行长表示，由于诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）销售增长疲软和美国关税，丹麦央行将大幅下调 2025 年的经济展望。【原文：Denmark’s central bank will cut its economic outlook for 2025 substantially because of weaker sales growth at Novo Nordisk A/S and US tariffs, according to its governor.】

item.title: 法拉奇在讨好英国中产阶级的同时也受到了反叛右翼势力的阻挠
item.description: 奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）刚刚告诉美国立法者，对网络言论的限制使英国陷入了 "独裁主义"，他又将在英国最大的改革会议上努力约束自己党派的代表。【原文：Fresh from telling US lawmakers that curbs on online speech have plunged the UK into “authoritarianism,” Nigel Farage will be trying to keep his own party’s representatives in check at Reform UK’s biggest gathering yet.】

item.title: 韩华海洋关联公司出售 10 亿美元股份后股价上涨三倍
item.description: 韩华海洋株式会社（Hanwha Ocean Co.）的一家附属公司出售了其在韩国造船厂的股份，筹集了约 1.4 万亿韩元（10 亿美元）的资金，而该公司的股价在过去一年中上涨了两倍多。【原文：A Hanwha Ocean Co. affiliate sold its stake in the South Korean shipbuilder, raising about 1.4 trillion won ($1 billion), after the company’s shares more than tripled over the past year.】

item.title: 前首席经济学家称日本央行 10 月利率难以确定
item.description: 日本央行前首席经济学家表示，市场对日本央行可能在10月份加息的猜测越来越多，这低估了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税竞选活动所带来的不确定性程度。【原文：Growing market speculation over a potential Bank of Japan rate hike in October is underestimating the degree of uncertainty wrought by Donald Trump’s tariff campaign, according to a former BOJ chief economist.】

item.title: 消费税和个人税减免可能吸引全球资金回流印度
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 委内瑞拉两架飞机飞越美国船只，紧张局势加剧
item.description: 据五角大楼称，两架委内瑞拉军用飞机飞越了海岸附近国际水域的一艘美国海军舰艇，这是继美国打击一艘据称从委内瑞拉运载毒品的快艇之后，两个对手之间的关系再次升级。【原文：Two Venezuelan military aircraft flew over an American naval vessel in international waters off the coast, according to the Pentagon, a fresh escalation between the two adversaries after the US struck a speedboat purportedly carrying drugs from the country.】

item.title: 铁矿石将实现周度上涨，利润率和供应成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于对中国恢复生产的预期提振了市场情绪，铁矿石自 7 月份以来首次连续一周上涨。【原文：Iron ore was headed for its first back-to-back weekly gain since July, as expectations of production resuming in China boosted sentiment.】

item.title: 嘀嗒的竞争对手小红书预计利润将增至三倍，达到 30 亿美元
item.description: 小红书科技股份有限公司（Xiaohongshu Technology Co.【原文：Xiaohongshu Technology Co. is on track to triple its profit to $3 billion this year, making progress with commercialization on the way to a potential public listing.】

item.title: 人工智能投资热潮让东京电子成为市场落后者
item.description: 全球人工智能投资热潮正在迅速改写半导体行业公司的命运。东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）就是其中的佼佼者。【原文：The global artificial intelligence investment frenzy is fast rewriting the fortunes of companies in the semiconductor industry. One notable laggard is Tokyo Electron Ltd.】
